title: emere - the new way to pay
creator: emere technology department

extendedInfo.description: emere is the new way to pay for small traditional cash purchases directly with your phone.  Look for participating retailers and vending machines with the "emere enabled" logo.  It is simple and secure to add funds to your wallet and use those funds to pay for purchases; just like using cash but safer.  No secure information is stored or used in the application so it's super safe to use.  Get specials and promotions on your phone as you frequent retailers or vending machines.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This apps is amazing. Makes buying things alot easier. Dont have to dig for change. Just click and BAM! You have your item.
reviews.author: Ryan Scott

reviews.title: Easiest app to use
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and love buying things with my phone.
reviews.author: Kirt Scott

reviews.title: Really cool app!
reviews.comment: Let\'s you pay for vending without worring about carrying cash around with you. Works every time! Never had a problem using the app or connecting to a device. Great new way of doing things!
reviews.author: Katie Tackett
